data.title: Sony Pictures Core | Stream, rent or buy Sony Pictures movies and TV on PlayStation consoles
data.meta_description: Enjoy Sony Pictures movies, TV shows and exclusive streaming premiers on PlayStation consoles with SONY PICTURES CORE.
data.text:
There are three ways to watch movies on SONY PICTURES CORE, but each begins with launching the app and creating an account.

Once signed into your account, you can select a movie, TV show, or other content by clicking on the artwork, and from there you will have the option to rent, buy or (in some cases) instantly stream the content:

When renting a movie, you will have 30 days to initiate playback and 48 hours to finish the movie after pressing play.

When buying a movie, it will be added to your Library, and you’ll be able to access that movie as many times as you like when signed into your account on SONY PICTURES CORE.

If the movie is part of a streaming package included with a PlayStation Plus Premium/Deluxe subscription or other streaming offer, you will be able to watch (stream) at no additional cost.

Sony Movie Credits will allow Sony Pictures Core users on eligible PlayStations to claim credit(s) within the Sony Pictures Core application that can be used to redeem for movies.

Note: Please see the CREDITS portion of the FAQs for information regarding credits. Credits cannot be used for Home Premiere movies.

Users who purchase an eligible device or participate in an eligible promotion can qualify for movie credits. Your eligibility for and use of Movie Credits is subject to the terms of any applicable promotion and the Sony Picture Core terms found here: https://www.sonypicturescore.com/termsofservice/EN/CA.

Note: If you think that you are entitled to credits and have not received credit(s), please reach out to our Customer Service team.

Users who participate in an eligible promotion can claim their credits in one of the following ways, depending on the details of the offer:

Launch the Sony Pictures Core application on PlayStation, click the highlighted MY LIBRARY icon in the navigation menu, and claim your credits within that tab.

For some offers, a credit voucher code will be emailed to your Sony Pictures Core associated email. Navigate to account settings in the app and – under the “Redeem Voucher” tab – enter the voucher code found in your email.

Note: Once Credit(s) are claimed, the number of credit(s) will be updated within the ticket icon in the bottom left corner of the application.

If a refund is issued for an item purchased as part of a promotion that awards movie credits, the associated credits will be removed alongside the refunded item.

Note: If you have had your credit(s) removed and think that you should have credits, please reach out to our Customer Service team.
